description: Senior Data Scientist | R&ampDSenior Data ScientistLondon£80, 000 £9, 000    travel allowanceTHE COMPANYHarnham are working with one of the most    exciting online/e-commerce companies worldwide in building a central    R&ampD function for the business from scratch.
